item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 24, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Frosted Glass from Games to the Web: HTML glass UI inspired by AAA game dev (443 points | 86 comments)
2. Evidence of oldest known alphabetic writing unearthed in ancient Syrian city (275 points | 191 comments)
3. Bocker: Docker implemented in around 100 lines of Bash (2015) (273 points | 78 comments)
4. Which Power Plant Does My Electricity Come From? (78 points | 30 comments)
5. How to give a senior leader feedback without getting fired (275 points | 230 comments)
6. A 132-Year-Old Message in a Bottle in a Scottish Lighthouse (32 points | 15 comments)
7. Jiga (YC W21) Is Hiring Operations Coordinator ( | hide)
8. Highest-resolution images ever captured of the sun’s surface (453 points | 122 comments)
9. Antenna Diodes in the Pentium Processor (214 points | 32 comments)
10. jQuery UI (18 points | 4 comments)
11. 32k context length text embedding models (67 points | 23 comments)
12. Undersea Cables Connect the Global Internet (12 points | 7 comments)
13. Three hundred words you can spell on a calculator [pdf] (62 points | 22 comments)
14. Deegen: A JIT-Capable VM Generator for Dynamic Languages (5 points | 1 comment)
15. Dear friend, you have built a Kubernetes (20 points | 4 comments)
16. Continuous Integration Dashboard for Apache NuttX RTOS (Prometheus and Grafana) (63 points | 1 comment)

19. Firefox DevTools Network Tab: How to filter requests by properties (67 points | 4 comments)
20. Using GPS in the Year 1565 (181 points | 28 comments)
21. Stack Analyser: detect technologies used inside a repo (50 points | 8 comments)
22. Size and albedo of the largest detected Oort-cloud object (101 points | 43 comments)
23. A century later, a taped message solves the mystery of a WWI doughboy's death (60 points | 34 comments)
24. Quake 3 Source Code Review: Network Model (2012) (304 points | 76 comments)
25. How to Make an STM (Scanning Tunneling Microscope) [video] (3 points | discuss)
26. The remarkable life and astonishing times of Dwight Smith Young (37 points | 2 comments)
27. Ice base melt revealed by multibeam imagery of an Antarctic ice shelf (92 points | 3 comments)
28. A short introduction to Interval Tree Clocks (2017) (68 points | 19 comments)
29. OpenMPTCProuter: Aggregate and encrypt multiple internet connections using MPTCP (148 points | 36 comments)
30. The Physics of Butterfly Wings (57 points | 11 comments)
